overview:
Yona Shtern is an accomplished consumer marketer with over 20 years in online, direct and retail marketing across a variety of product categories, including: beauty & fashion, telecommunications and consumer products. Prior to joining Diamond, Yona was CEO of Gosh Marketing - a leading consumer products company that supplies many of North America’s most important retailers.

Previously, Yona has held executive positions at My Virtual Model, Microcell (Fido), Saks Fifth Avenue and Avon Products. He is a frequent speaker at international marketing and technology forums and has received numerous awards for his advertising, product launch and marketing strategies.

funding_round.source_description: Great News! Get Me Listed Closes Successful Seed Round
